body:
## Bug Report

```
[FATAL] [lib.rs:503] ["[region 36201] 36202 unexpected ready source region 29157, expecting 37097"] 
backtrace="stack backtrace:   
0: tikv_util::set_panic_hook::{{closure}}   
1: std::panicking::rust_panic_with_hook             at src/libstd/panicking.rs:475   
2: rust_begin_unwind             at src/libstd/panicking.rs:375   
3: std::panicking::begin_panic_fmt      at src/libstd/panicking.rs:326   
4: tikv::raftstore::store::fsm::apply::ApplyDelegate::exec_admin_cmd
5: tikv::raftstore::store::fsm::apply::ApplyDelegate::apply_raft_cmd
6: tikv::raftstore::store::fsm::apply::ApplyDelegate::process_raft_cmd
7: tikv::raftstore::store::fsm::apply::ApplyDelegate::handle_raft_committed_entries  
8: tikv::raftstore::store::fsm::apply::ApplyFsm::handle_tasks 
9: <tikv::raftstore::store::fsm::apply::ApplyPoller as batch_system::batch::PollHandler<tikv::raftstore::store::fsm::apply::ApplyFsm,tikv::raftstore::store::fsm::apply::ControlFsm>>::handle_normal
10: std::sys_common::backtrace::__rust_begin_short_backtrace 
11: core::ops::function::FnOnce::call_once{{vtable.shim}}
12: <alloc::boxed::Box<F> as core::ops::function::FnOnce<A>>::call_once             at /rustc/0de96d37fbcc54978458c18f5067cd9817669bc8/src/liballoc/boxed.rs:1022  
13: <alloc::boxed::Box<F> as core::ops::function::FnOnce<A>>::call_once             at /rustc/0de96d37fbcc54978458c18f5067cd9817669bc8/src/liballoc/boxed.rs:1022      std::sys_common::thread::start_thread             at src/libstd/sys_common/thread.rs:13      std::sys::unix::thread::Thread::new::thread_start\n             at src/libstd/sys/unix/thread.rs:80  
14: start_thread  
15: clone
 [location=src/raftstore/store/fsm/apply.rs:1830] [thread_name=apply-1]
```
tikv.log
[https://drive.google.com/file/d/1dV8FybUlbReVAZWWBxsNkPs7cIIPSpGv/view?usp=sharing](url)

After region A has merged to region B, if region B just yields its apply fsm once before another region merges to region B, the panic as above will happen when region B applies the CommitMerge log.

### What version of TiKV are you using?

v3.0.5.hotfix
title: raftstore: unexpected ready source region when merging
